name: mon-me
description: doing the legwork of checking comments / relevant data using cypress.io
author: Viorel PETCU

scripts.cy-all: yarn art --env i=0 && yarn art --env i=1 && yarn art --env i=2 && yarn art --env i=3 && yarn art --env i=4 && yarn art --env i=5 && yarn art --env i=6 && yarn art --env i=7
